name: Fro Fro's Adventures (Bitter Jam)
description:
-----------------------------------

Game:

Fro Fro is an Arctic rabbit. She  finds herself dashing around the universe in search of one thing: green orbs. Why? She is a rabbit... Rabbits love green orbs.  

-----------------------------------

Controls:

WASD or Arrow Keys - Movement

SPACE - Charge Dash

WASD or Arrow Keys - Dash (When charged)

ESC - Close Game

Visuals:

Q - Remove TV effect

-----------------------------------

Game Jam:

BITTER JAM:

Bitter Jam is a 60 hour long game jam running from May 1st, 2020 to May 4th. All games submitted must only use the tilesheet provided to jammers at the start of the jam.
